metadata.title: Compatibility of the RX23E-B and RX23E-A

sections.content:
Question:
Is the RX23E-B compatible with the RX23E-A?
Answer:
The RX23E-B and RX23-A are equipped with different AFE, so there is no pin compatibility. However, they have common CPU cores and basic peripheral functions, allowing the design assets of the RX23E-A to be inherited. 
With regard to the detailed differences, a comparison of the incorporated functions is summarized in the following application note.
Differences Between the RX23E-B Group and the RX23E-A Group (R01AN6503)
Suitable Products
RX23E-B
Is the RX23E-B compatible with the RX23E-A?
